meanings: To give up or stop doing something
examples: They had to abandon the project due to lack of funds.

meanings: To provide space or adjust to needs
examples: The hotel can accommodate up to 200 guests.

meanings: To evaluate or estimate the value
examples: The manager will assess the team's performance.

meanings: A financial plan for a period
examples: The company set a strict budget for the new project.
The teams collaborated to complete the task on time.
She delegated the report to her assistant.
The new system is more efficient than the old one.

meanings: To put a plan or system into action
examples: The company will implement new policies next month.
Customer satisfaction is our top priority.
The company's revenue increased by 10% this year.
